code:
var fetchIpData=new Promise(function(resolve,reject){var ajax=new XMLHttpRequest();if(window.location.href.includes("localhost")){/**
     *  Resolve with dummydata, GET call will be rejected,
     *  since ipinfos server is configured that way
     */resolve({data:{country:"DE"}});return;}ajax.open("GET","https://ipinfo.io/json");ajax.onload=function(){var response=JSON.parse(ajax.responseText);if(response){resolve(response);}else{reject();}};ajax.onerror=reject;ajax.send();});export default fetchIpData;
